mapper.select: SELECT E.ID, E.SEI, E.MEI, E.SEI_KANA, E.MEI_KANA, E.LOGIN_PASSWORD, R.ROLE_ID, E.DEP_ID, D.DEP_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE_ROLE R ON E.ID = R.EMP_ID INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEP_ID = D.ID WHERE E.ID = #{id}
